Text: Do people have problems with no text in game? My game has text but keeps crashing.

Thanks, its fixed the no text. But i am at the part where you fight your brother. Since he have barbaric unit the game crash. I know steam released a quickfix for that but i cant find a place where to get the quickfix, any sugestion?

I use a quick fan made fix from the eng section of the official forum.
http://forum.1cpublishing.eu/showthread.php?t=35494
